function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential exposure to COVID-19 during travel to the workplace via public transportation modes","Impact":"Increased risk of introducing COVID-19 to the workplace","Mitigation":"Providing a quarantine facility and conducting diagnostic tests before entry into the workplace","Technologies":"Antigen-detecting rapid diagnostic tests (Ag-RDTs), reverse transcription-polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR)","People":"Workers in mining, oil, and gas companies with on-and-off schedules","Owner":"Company management"},{"Description":"Lack of periodic medical check-ups (MCUs) to assess and monitor worker health","Impact":"Inadequate prevention and control of COVID-19 in the workplace","Mitigation":"Implementing periodic MCUs for COVID-19 prevention, comorbid review, self-health evaluation, and self-quarantine","Technologies":"MCUs for COVID-19, comorbid review, self-health evaluation","People":"Workers in the offshore workplace","Owner":"Company management"},{"Description":"Reliance on a hierarchy of controls for COVID-19 prevention with challenges in elimination","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness in controlling COVID-19 spread","Mitigation":"Implementing engineering control, administrative control, and PPE measures in combination","Technologies":"Engineering control, administrative control, PPE","People":"Workers in the built environment","Owner":"Company management"}]}
